csw:Record.dc:title: Arctic Ocean - Temperature and Salinity Climatology V1.1
csw:Record.dc:subject: Oceanographic geographical features
Temperature of the water column
Salinity of the water column
ITS-90 water temperature
Water body salinity
Arctic Ocean
oceans
csw:Record.dct:abstract:
Climatology done from the SeaDataNet aggregated dataset v1.1 for the North Arctic Ocean. The version used for the DIVA software is the 4.6.10 (prerelease 4.6.11). The period covers 1900-2013.
For data access please register at http://www.marine-id.org
csw:Record.dc:description:
Climatology done from the SeaDataNet aggregated dataset v1.1 for the North Arctic Ocean. The version used for the DIVA software is the 4.6.10 (prerelease 4.6.11). The period covers 1900-2013.
For data access please register at http://www.marine-id.org
csw:Record.dc:source: The data used as input for this product have been extracted from the SeadataNet Download Service: http://www.seadatanet.org/Data-Access/Common-Data-Index-CDI

dc:URI.name: Arctic/Salinity.19002014.4Danl.nc*Salinity_deepest_L1
dc:URI.description: Deepest values of Salinity masked using relative error threshold 0.3

dc:URI.description: Deepest values of Salinity masked using relative error threshold 0.5
